# 为何GAIL得到的Reward没有一点用处?

GAIL算法最后会训练出两个网络:

  1. πθ∗\pi_\theta^{*}π​θ​∗​​: 策略网络

  2. D∗D^{*}D​∗​​: 评价网络

GAIL算法的目标函数是:

L(D,πθ)=EπE[log(D(x))]+Eπθ[log(1−D(x)]L(D,\pi_{\theta}) = \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{E}} \left[ log(D(x)) \right] + \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}\left[log(1-D(x)\right] L(D,π​θ​​)=E​π​E​​​​[log(D(x))]+E​π​θ​​​​[log(1−D(x)]

我们在训练D时, 固定πθ\pi_{\theta}π​θ​​, 要最大化L(D,πθ)L(D,\pi_{\theta})L(D,π​θ​​)。

单个 x=(s,a)x=(s,a)x=(s,a) 对对L(D,πθ)L(D,\pi_{\theta})L(D,π​θ​​)的贡献是:

\pi_{E}}(x) logD(x) + \pi_{\theta}(x)log(1-D(x))

令上式对DDD的一阶导为0, 可得:

D∗(x)=πE(x)πE(x)+πθ(x)D^*(x) = \frac{\pi_{E}(x)}{\pi_{E}(x) +\pi_{\theta}(x)} D​∗​​(x)=​π​E​​(x)+π​θ​​(x)​​π​E​​(x)​​

带入到 L(D,πθ)L(D,\pi_{\theta})L(D,π​θ​​), 得到:

L(D∗,πθ)=2JSD(πE∥πθ)−2log2L(D^*, \pi_{\theta}) = 2JSD(\pi_{E} \| \pi_{\theta}) - 2log2 L(D​∗​​,π​θ​​)=2JSD(π​E​​∥π​θ​​)−2log2

训练πθ\pi_{\theta}π​θ​​时, 固定DDD, 要最小化L(D,πθ)L(D,\pi_{\theta})L(D,π​θ​​)。

当D=D∗D=D^*D=D​∗​​时，L(D∗,πθ)L(D^*, \pi_{\theta})L(D​∗​​,π​θ​​)是一个常数，θ\thetaθ 的改变不会引起LLL的变化, 要知道更新θ\thetaθ是需要求LLL的导数的, 常数的导数为0。所以给不了π\piπ任何反馈, θ\thetaθ的值不会有任何变化，所以G是永远都训练不起来的。

为什么是一个常数?

Theorem 2.3 in paper "Towards Principled Methods For Training Generative Adversarial Network":

Let Pr\mathbb{P}_rP​r​​ and Pg\mathbb{P}_gP​g​​ be two distributions whose support lies in two manifolds M\mathcal{M}M and P\mathcal{P}P that don’t have full dimension and don’t perfectly align. We further assume that Pr\mathbb{P}_rP​r​​ and Pg\mathbb{P}_gP​g​​ are continuous in their respective manifolds. Then,

  1. JSD(Pr∥Pg)=log2JSD(\mathbb{P}_r \| \mathbb{P}_g) = log2JSD(P​r​​∥P​g​​)=log2
  2. KL(Pr∥Pg)=+∞KL(\mathbb{P}_r \| \mathbb{P}_g) = +\inftyKL(P​r​​∥P​g​​)=+∞
  3. KL(Pg∥Pr)=+∞KL(\mathbb{P}_g \| \mathbb{P}_r) = +\inftyKL(P​g​​∥P​r​​)=+∞

总结:

  1. 当 D=D∗D=D^*D=D​∗​​ 时，DDD的给不了 π\piπ 任何有效的反馈。
